favourite.article: Great to sing the old songs that bring such comfort and where you can sing your testimonies.
Jesus is the best of friends indeed. Oh wonderful hymn, wonderful.

Forfeiture of our peace is our own making ignorantly. Can you imagine the needless pain we bear as if we can carry it! Heb. 12:1-2 This hymn is prayer itself that searches my heart. Ps.139:23-24 It's touching my innermost parts of my heart.

When I heard this song it touches my heart and it encourages me that I should take everything in prayer... Whatever it is we should pray it to the Lord, brothers and sisters, because He is the only Friend of ours that will never betray us. Amen. Hallelujah.

Yeah, I need to learn to carry everything to God in prayer. And even take all my cares and troubles to the Lord in prayer. Lord, You are the dearest and most faithful Friend that we can ever have. Amen.
Lovely words and tune, a blessing to my soul and my family enjoys it too
Sometimes we are cheated by our friend. But how lucky we have a friend like Jesus.

Right now, I'm feeling hard times, and I really need the lord. This song is really soothing and reminds me that Jesus can be our friend.
He can be the One who cares for us, One who we can share the burden of life with. The new tune has a nice ring to it, but when I get into the lyrics, it just touches the heart on how Jesus can really be personal. One that we can everything too. Whether in good times or bad.
